Posts.Content: I HAD CANCER TWO YEARS AGO AND NOW I HAVE CANCER AGAIN I WENT THROUGH SURGERY AND CHEMO AND I HAVE ONE MORE TREATMENT TO GO I FEEL THAT I AM BLESSED TO BE HERE TO TELL MY STORY TO TELL HOW IT MADE ME FEEL I WANTED TO GIVE UP THE SECOND TIME BUT I COULD NOT I HAD TO FIGHT I HAD TO FIGHT FOR ME AND MY FAMILY I DID NOT WANT TO LIVE ANYMORE BUT NOW I FEEL I HAVE ALOT TO LIVE FOR I AM BLESSED AND HAPPY TO KNOW THAT I CAN MAKE IT THROUGH IF I PUT MY MIND TO IT AND TRUST IN GOD!
Posts.Title: I AM BLESSED!
